name: pikchr-block
description: A Gutenberg block to render Pikchr
author: Paul Bunkham

scripts.build:wasm: EM_NODE_JS="$EMSDK_NODE" emcc -O3 lib/pikchr.c -o lib/pikchr.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_pikchr","_free","_malloc"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["stringToUTF8","lengthBytesUTF8","UTF8ToString"]' -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='web'
